solution_line_template: She performs {poses_per_weekday} sun salutations on the weekdays so that's {weekdays_per_week} days so that's {poses_per_weekday}*{weekdays_per_week} = <<{poses_per_weekday}*{weekdays_per_week}={salutations_per_week}>>{salutations_per_week} sun salutations a week

There are {weeks_per_year} weeks in a year and she performs {salutations_per_week} sun salutations every week for a total of {weeks_per_year}*{salutations_per_week} = <<{weeks_per_year}*{salutations_per_week}={total_salutations_per_year}>>1,300 sun salutations a year
